<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Raised by Belief](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=438)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

Whether in a monastery, a religious household, or just as part of your everyday life, your upbringing was steeped in the traditions of a faith or philosophy. You might remain committed or you may have turned from your childhood creed, but your skills are still founded in your devotion.

 Choose two ability boosts. One must be to an attribute
specified in your deity’s Divine Attribute and the other is a free
attribute boost.

 You’re trained in your deity’s associated skill, and you gain [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) with that skill. You gain a [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill with a subcategory associated with your deity (Abadar Lore, for instance).
name: Raised by Belief
